title: Communications (Retention of Data) (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 25 of 2022),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Communications (Retention of Data)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Communications (Retention of Data) 

(Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited communication (retention data) (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) (no 2) order 2023

title: Communications (Retention of Data) (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 25 of 2022),
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
Communications (Retention of Data) (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 25 of 2022), 
insofar as it is not already in operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 July, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [390] 3
